Title: Nigerian Traditional Fashion Styles
Description: NaijaTradstyles is a social network for Nigerians all over the world to find traditional clothing styles and share their styles with people. Use NaijaTradStyles to find unique and trendy traditional styles to sew for different events. Local designers can also post their styles.
HomeWiki:
NaijaTradStyles is a website that gives users and designers the opportunity to showcase their designs. Users can also obtain News, fashion, tips and hot styles. They can also join designers fan club where they get updates about their favourite designers.

This project is currently in setup mode and only available to project coordinators and developers. Once you have finished setting up your project you can publish it to make it available to all CodePlex visitors.
